titles.title: CAPABILITY Act of 2019
CAPABILITY Act of 2019
Customized Approaches to Providing And Building Independent Lives of Inclusion for Transition-aged Youth Act of 2019
Customized Approaches to Providing And Building Independent Lives of Inclusion for Transition-aged Youth Act of 2019
To amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to establish a demonstration program to assist transition-aged youth with covered disabilities in obtaining customized, competitive integrated employment.
CAPABILITY Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
